Name: Stonga Bird
About the game: Stonga Bird is a score attack game about an irradiated bird who has a hard time staying in the air. Time your little 'hops' to dodge the industrial pipes to prevent death. Your bird is very fragile and will explode upon contact with anything but the clear air. You have to avoid all obstacles and reach as high of a score as possible to brag to your friends. This is a portrait-mode windowed game which was designed to be played with a mouse.
